card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a noncreature permanent. Target permanent you control gains protection from the card type of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that type.)

card.name: Past Inspiration
card.text: Choose X. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Put a lore counter on target permanent you control. • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. • Put target card in your graveyard on top of your library. • Target creature gains, "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card." until end of turn.

card.name: The Oldest Story
card.text: Read Ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after IV.) I — Create a 1/1 black and green Elf creature token. II, III — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control it gains trample until end of turn. IV — Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Notyis, Grown from Tales
card.text: When this creature enters, mill X cards, if X is 4 or more, create a Murmur token. (It's a colorless Saga Murmur enchantment with "{2ch.png},{3ch.png}— Add {C}.") Sagas you control have "{4ch.png}—Return target non-saga card from your graveyard to your hand."

card.name: Pel's Compound Duple
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after VI.) I, II, III — Trigger target {1ch.png} chapter ability of another target Saga. IV, V, VI — Trigger target {2ch.png} chapter ability of another target Saga. ​

card.name: Earthbound Theater
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: This land becomes a Saga enchantment until end of turn. Put a lore counter on it. (Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Add {B}. III — Add one mana of any color. ​

card.name: Rooted Theater
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: This land becomes a Saga enchantment until end of turn. Put a lore counter on it. (Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Add {G}. III — Add one mana of any color. ​

card.name: Rapid Reading
card.text: Put X lore counters on up to one target permanent you control. Exile a number of cards from the top of your library equal to the number of lore counters you put on permanents you control this turn. You may cast them this turn.

card.name: Crowd Pleaser
card.text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever an exalted ability of a creature you control triggers choose from among first strike, lifelink, trample, or menace. Each attacking creature gains that ability.

card.name: Amplification Construct
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you put a lore counter on a permanent you control, target player mills two cards, then you may cast a card milled this way by tapping this creature in addition to its other costs.

card.name: Siren Seabed
card.text: Whenever one or more Sirens you control becomes untapped, noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast until end of turn. {UR}{UR}{UR}, Discard this card: Create two 1/1 blue and red Siren creature tokens with "{T}: Target creature can't block alone until end of turn."

card.name: Wailing Whisps
card.text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Counters can't be removed to pay costs.

card.name: Soloists Pledge
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.) I — Destroy all creatures. II — Creature spells cost {2} more to cast until your next turn. III — Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. IV — Target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature card in all graveyards.

card.name: Blessing Barker
card.text: Flying Finale — Whenever an enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each untapped creature you control.

card.name: Olgal Composer
card.text: When this creature enters, you may search your graveyard, hand and/or library for a card named Standard Repertoire and/or a card named Olgal's Calling and put them onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

card.name: Sudden Screeching
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Flash I — This Saga deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. II, III — Target creature can't block alone until end of turn.

card.name: Beat Boxer
card.text: This creature has hexproof as long as its untapped. {2}{CG}, Discard this creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Ascent of the Worthy
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Choose a creature you control. Until your next turn, all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control is dealt to that creature instead. III — Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a flying counter on it. That creature is an Angel Warrior in addition to its other types. ​

card.name: Binding of the Old Gods
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls. II — Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. III — Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Bounty of the Luxa
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all flood counters from this enchantment. If no counters were removed this way, put a flood counter on this enchantment and draw a card. Otherwise, add {C}{G}{U}.

card.name: Frenzied Fugue
card.text: Enchant permanent When this enchantment enters the battlefield or at the beginning of your upkeep, gain control of enchanted permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Korvold and the Noble Thief
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II, III — Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Exile the top three cards of target opponent's library. You may play those cards this turn. ​

card.name: Lilting Refrain
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on this enchantment. Sacrifice this enchantment: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of verse counters on this enchantment.

card.name: Lorehold Excavation
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, mill a card. If a land card was milled this way, you gain 1 life. Otherwise, this enchantment deals 1 damage to each opponent. {5}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

card.name: Love Song of Night and Day
card.text: Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — You and target opponent each draw two cards. III — Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying. Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

card.name: No Rest for the Wicked
card.text: Sacrifice this enchantment: Return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Quicksilver Dagger
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. You draw a card."

card.name: Second Wind
card.text: Enchant creature {T}: Tap enchanted creature. {T}: Untap enchanted creature.

card.name: Serra's Embrace
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.

card.name: Song of Freyalise
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Until your next turn, creatures you control gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color." III — Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance, trample, and indestructible until end of turn. ​

card.name: Song of Serenity
card.text: Creatures that are enchanted can't attack or block.

card.name: Song of the Dryads
card.text: Enchant permanent Enchanted permanent is a colorless Forest land.

card.name: Songbirds' Blessing
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an Aura card. You may put that card onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: The Bath Song
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Draw two cards, then discard a card. III — Shuffle any number of target cards from your graveyard into your library. Add {U}{U}. ​

card.name: The Eldest Reborn
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each opponent discards a card. II — Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Torch Song
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on this enchantment. {2}{R}, Sacrifice this enchantment: It deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of verse counters on Torch Song.

card.name: Vile Requiem
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on this enchantment. {1}{B}, Sacrifice Vile Requiem: Destroy up to X target nonblack creatures, where X is the number of verse counters on this enchantment. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Murmur VGE
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III) I — "Their song echos on and on." II, III — Add {C}. ​

card.name: Leviathan VGE
card.text: Trample

card.name: Rat VGE
card.text: This token can't block.
